comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Probably this one (he had a son also named Colgate Hoyt b. 1883, but this man looks older than 30): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colgate_Hoyt

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to NYT of July 21, 1912 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E07E2D81E3CE633A... his first wife died in 1908. So this is probably the former Mrs. Katherine Sharp Cheeseman, daughter of a Judge Sharp from San Francisco. The article is about the wedding and Hoyt. E.C. Benedict, whose yacht they are on here, was at the small wedding.
